metadata.feature_description: Interface for selecting analytics time periods and date ranges for all analytics views

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Select predefined periods (day, week, month, year)

steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads with time period selector visible
steps.actual: Dashboard loaded successfully with Answers tab showing default '1 w' (week) period

steps.action: Click on time period dropdown to see available options
steps.actual: Dropdown opened showing options: Day, Week, Month, Year, and Custom

steps.expected: Dashboard updates to show 1-day data range
steps.actual: Dashboard updated to show single day data (27 Feb 2026 - 27 Feb 2026) with '1 d' indicator

steps.expected: Dashboard updates to show 1-month data range
steps.actual: Dashboard updated to show 29 Jan 2026 - 27 Feb 2026 with '1 m' indicator

steps.expected: Dashboard updates to show 1-year data range
steps.actual: Dashboard updated to show 28 Feb 2025 - 27 Feb 2026 with '1 y' indicator

steps.action: Click on time period dropdown and select 'Custom'
steps.expected: Custom date picker opens with calendar interface
steps.actual: Custom date picker opened showing dual calendars (From/To) with February 2026 displayed

steps.action: Select custom date range from February 1, 2026 to February 27, 2026
steps.expected: Selected dates are highlighted in the calendars
steps.actual: Date range selected showing Feb 1 as start date and Feb 27 as end date highlighted in blue

steps.expected: Dashboard updates to show data for the custom date range
steps.actual: Dashboard updated showing '1 Feb 2026 - 27 Feb 2026' in the date display with appropriate chart data

steps.action: Open custom date picker and observe calendar boundaries
steps.expected: Calendar should have appropriate navigation limits
steps.actual: Calendar allows navigating through available dates with month/year navigation arrows

steps.action: Verify year period shows maximum 1 year range
steps.expected: Year period shows exactly 1 year of data
steps.actual: Year period correctly shows 28 Feb 2025 - 27 Feb 2026 (exactly 1 year)

steps.action: Open custom date picker and attempt to navigate to future months
steps.expected: Future months should be disabled or not selectable
steps.actual: Future months (March 2026 onwards) are disabled in the calendar picker, preventing selection of future dates

steps.expected: Only dates up to current date should be selectable
steps.actual: Calendar shows February 2026 as current month with dates after Feb 28 not available for selection

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify data updates on period change

steps.action: Change from Year to Day period and observe chart updates
steps.expected: Charts should refresh with new data range, x-axis labels should change
steps.actual: Day view shows single day data with chart x-axis showing only 'THU', Year view shows full year with dates from FEB 2025 to FEB 2026

steps.action: Apply custom date range and verify Engagement chart x-axis
steps.expected: Chart x-axis should show dates within custom range
steps.actual: Engagement chart x-axis shows dates from FEB 1 through FEB 25, reflecting the custom date range

steps.action: Set custom date range (1 Feb 2026 - 27 Feb 2026) on Answers tab
steps.expected: Custom date range is applied to Answers tab
steps.actual: Custom date range '1 Feb 2026 - 27 Feb 2026' successfully applied to Answers tab

steps.expected: Observe whether date range persists across tabs
steps.actual: Blogs tab shows different date range '21 Feb 2026 - 27 Feb 2026' with '1 w' selected, indicating tabs maintain independent date ranges

steps.action: Verify Answers tab retained its custom range by checking page snapshot
steps.expected: Answers tab should still show custom range
steps.actual: Page snapshot confirms Answers tab retained '1 Feb 2026 - 27 Feb 2026' while Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki all show '21 Feb 2026 - 27 Feb 2026'. Each content type tab maintains its own independent date range selection.

observations: Each content type tab (Answers, Blogs, Discussions, Events, Ideas, Wiki) maintains its own independent date range selection. Setting a custom range on one tab does not affect other tabs.
The Comparative Term dropdown (1d, 1w, 1m, 1y) is separate from the main date range selector and also appears to be tab-independent.
The custom date picker displays dual calendars for selecting From and To dates, providing a clear interface for range selection.
Future dates are properly disabled in the calendar picker (months after February 2026 are not selectable as of testing date Feb 28, 2026).
All predefined periods (Day, Week, Month, Year) correctly calculate date ranges relative to the current date.
Code files at the specified paths (Dnn.AdminExperience.Evoq.Engage) were not available for code review; testing was based solely on UI behavior.
